thread.title_full: No Cost College Prep and 3D Learning Lens Courses Available on eLearning Website

author: Sandra Evans PR MGR
title: No Cost College Prep and 3D Learning Lens Courses Available on eLearning Website
text:
Teracle, Inc . released their eLearning website, SSAMCAST, with a lineup of engaging and educational content for anyone to view for no cost. SSAMCAST launched in June to give students access to high quality learning resources without the price tag of traditional tutoring services and supplemental education. Partnering with UC Berkeley students, SSAMCAST created free college preparatory courses in SAT Writing, Reading, Math, AP Calculus, Chemistry, and many more. Using the lightboard technology, teachers can face their students while they write their lecture notes on the board. SSAMCAST engineers have applied 3D modeling to render unique, dynamic, and interactive online content called “learning lens” courses. These courses add another layer of depth and understanding into the course material by helping students to grasp difficult concepts and easily visualize shapes, diagrams, and structures.
SSAMCAST also includes a series of interviews in which the current college students share their experiences and give first-hand advice to incoming freshmen. These CollegeTalk interviews are dedicated to preparing high school students for their higher education.
Whether you are a student, parent, teacher, or just someone willing to learn– please take the time to visit http://www.ssamcast.com to see how Teracle is changing the face of eLearning. The SSAMCAST content team is always looking for ways to provide useful information for its users, so email ssamcast(at)gmail(dot)com to request additional courses.
About SSAMCAST
SSAMCAST is an open source learning website that offers a variety of high school and college level courses for free. Our mission is to use the latest technology to provide free and accessible resources for students and teachers. By using SSAMCAST, people can not only learn from many different learning lens courses, but also teach their own course with our tech support.
About Teracle, Inc.
Established in January 2013, Teracle, Inc. has been working to revolutionize the experience of learning by offering a variety of educational IT services for both Personal Computers (PC) and mobile devices. By collaborating with students, teachers and parents to reach students all over the world, Teracle Inc., uses the latest advancements to help others access free, quality education. Teracle, Inc. has created several online education platforms like King of Review and SSAMCAST that provide high quality learning content with lightboard and 3D technology.
